name: handicapped
content:
having an illness, injury, or condition that makes it difficult to do some things that other people do. This word is now considered offensive by many people, who prefer to say someone has a disability or is disabled. Synonym
disabled
the handicapped
people who have an illness, injury, or condition that makes it difficult to do some things that other people do, considered as a group. This term is now considered offensive, and people usually prefer to say people with disabilities or disabled people.
